name: RetrieveBatchLineItems
description:
Retrieve batch line item records by ID or custom property.

Use this tool to retrieve multiple line item records from HubSpot CRM using their IDs or a custom unique property. This is helpful for accessing specific sets of records without manually querying each one individually.

parameters.name: batch_request_body
parameters.description: JSON object with optional `idProperty`, list of `inputs` with `id`, `properties`, and `propertiesWithHistory` to retrieve records.

propertiesWithHistory.description: Key-value pairs for setting properties for the new object and their histories.

idProperty.description: When using a custom unique value property to retrieve records, the name of the property. Do not include this parameter if retrieving by record ID.

properties.description: Key-value pairs for setting properties for the new object.

parameters.name: retrieve_only_archived
parameters.description: Set to true to retrieve only archived line items.

value_schema.description: Whether to return only results that have been archived.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the hubspot_crm API.

parameters.name: archived
parameters.description: Whether to return only results that have been archived.

value_schema.description: Whether to return only results that have been archived.

propertiesWithHistory.description: Key-value pairs for setting properties for the new object and their histories.

idProperty.description: When using a custom unique value property to retrieve records, the name of the property. Do not include this parameter if retrieving by record ID.

properties.description: Key-value pairs for setting properties for the new object.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
